name: Evil End
description:
this game was made for thee 20 second game jam (https://itch.io/jam/20-second-game-jam).

unfortunately i became super ill right in the middle of the dev time, but i reeeeeally wanted to finish it, so i kept going, giving myself the same amount of time i would've had if i didn't sneeze my face off.

to play, you must defeat the castle! to do this you must forge a strong blade by collecting the swords around the map. if your sword does equal too or more damage than the enemy has health, you will defeat them. they will do damage to you each time you pass them.

to move, click and drag on the hero, and draw a path. when you let go, the hero will follow the path and all the encounters will resolve in sequence.

alt+f4 to exit ... sorry, ran out of time lmao

good luck, and if you want to see how this game was developed, check out my youtube @ kurtiswow.

game design and dev by kurtiswow

art by LuisTheCoolestGamer
